author: felicepantaleo
body:
In the Cellular Automaton, we now require that, if two doublets are aligned in the xy-plane, they also have to be aligned with the beamspot  (region radius + tolerance).
This has the effect of reducing the fake rate for pt > 10GeV/c, for quadruplets and especially for triplets.

@VinInn @rovere @makortel 
Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_1_X #16491 (original by @felicepantaleo).
title: Pixel Phase I - CA - improving fake rejection at high pt
